loans.use: To purchase baby livestock to raise and sell in the future

loans.name: Judith Marisol

texts.es: Judith Marisol C. de 41 años de edad, se dedica a la venta de cosméticos, de diferentes marcas y precios, reside en el departamento de Ahuachapán, en donde vive junto a su esposo quien trabaja como maestro de matemáticas y junto a sus dos hijos de 16 y 14 años de edad. Judith es alguien que le encanta trabajar por el bienestar de su familia, ya que ha pesar de muchos esfuerzos, todo se ve retribuido de la mejor manera al ver a su grupo familiar viviendo de una manera estable y feliz. Ella trabaja de forma ambulante ofreciendo diferentes tipos de cosméticos como cremas, maquillaje, perfumes, y otros más, así mismo comercializa joyas, lo cual ofrece de casa en casa con sus vecinos y amigos. Sus ventas son bastante estables, por lo que desea poder aumentar su inventario para hacer crecer su negocio, ya que en la actualidad cuenta con muy poco productos. Judith solicita un préstamo por medio del cual compre mayor cantidad de cosméticos y así mismo de joyas, ella necesita poder contar con el dinero del préstamo hecho a Integral, debido a que sus ventas son al crédito, por lo que no siempre cuenta con el dinero necesario para comprar todo lo que necesita. Judith desea mucho mejorar su negocio y de esta forma crecer como comerciante.
texts.en:
Judith Marisol C. is 41 years old, and dedicates herself to selling cosmetics of various brands and prices. She lives in the Department of Ahuachapán along with her husband, a math teacher, and her two children ages 16 and 14. Judith is someone who loves to work for the well-being of her family since, despite having to put forth a great effort, it is worth it to see her family living a stable and happy life. She works as a merchant, offering different types of beauty products such as creams, makeup, perfumes, and other items. She also sells jewelry, which she offers door-to-door to neighbors and friends. Her sales are stable, and she would like to augment her inventory to grow her business as she currently has very few products. Judith requests a loan in order to buy a larger quantity of cosmetics and jewelry. She needs to be able to rely on the loan made by Integral because her sales are done on a credit basis. For this reason, she does not always have the necessary capital to buy all the goods she requires. Judith wishes to improve her business and, in this manner, grow as a merchant.

Translated from Spanish by Mary Lynn Malaby, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase a variety of cosmetics and jewelry.

loans.name: Sigfrido Ernesto

texts.es: Sigfrido Ernesto D. T. es un joven de 20 años de edad, el cual es muy trabajador y el cual cuenta con grandes deseos de salir adelante y poder contar con una vida mejor. Vive junto a sus padres y un hermano mayor, con quienes reside en el departamento de Sonsonate. Sigfrido posee una venta de chips, recargas de saldo para celulares de diferentes compañías, y así mismo tarjetas de recargas, el negocio se encuentra ubicado en su casa de habitación en donde vende con sus vecinos, amigos, familiares y personas que transitan la zona, su negocio es muy estable, por lo que desea seguir creciendo en el. Es por esto que solicita un préstamo con el fin de poder comprar mayor cantidad de chips, recargas electrónicas y tarjetas de recarga para celulares, así mismo desea ampliar su negocio, iniciando uno nuevo en la casa de su abuela en el cual comercialice los mismo productos. Sigfrido es un joven muy emprendedor y lleno de deseos de superarse y de esta forma salir adelante y así contar con todos los medios para poseer una vida estable y un buen futuro.
texts.en:
Sigfrido Ernesto D. T. is a young 20-year old man, who is hard-working and has a great desire to get ahead and achieve a better life. He lives with his parents and older brother in the Department of Sonsonante. Sigfrido has a business selling cell phone chips, recharges and balances from different companies, and pre-paid phone cards. The business is located in his house, where he sells to neighbors, friends, and people who travel through the area. The business is very stable, which is why he would like to continue to grow it. For this reason, he requests a loan to buy a greater quantity of cell phone supplies. He would also like to make some improvements to his business, and start a new one in his grandmother’s house where he would sell the same types of items. Sigfrido is a very entrepreneurial youngster, with a great desire to succeed. He wants to get ahead so he can have all the means necessary for a stable life and bright prospects for the future.

Translated from Spanish by Mary Lynn Malaby, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase cell phone supplies.

loans.name: Razia Begum

texts.en:
Razia Begum lives in Riwind, a city famous for its dairy business, with her family. She has spent 20 years of her life in this city. She has two sons and both of them work. One does embroidery work by taking orders from the city. The other is running a video center in the market, where he sells video cassettes, DVDs, etc. 

Razia Begum’s husband is a street hawker. He sells different kinds of edible items such as nimko, chips and sweets in different streets of the town. Razia Begum also financially supports her family by doing embroidery for her neighborhood clients.
 
She has applied for a loan to help her son, who wants to buy an embroidering machine for his embroidery business. Before, he did hand embroidery but due to a large amount of orders, he needs an embroidery machine to fulfill them on time. 

Razia Begum is hopeful that this investment will have a positive impact on her son’s business and his income will be increased.

loans.use: Purchase embroidering machine for her son's embroidery business

loans.name: Francisco Eddy

texts.es: Francisco Eddy R. V. de 39 años de edad, reside en el departamento de San Salvador, lugar en el cual vive junto a sus dos hijas menores de edad, y junto a su esposa quien se dedica a los quehaceres del hogar. Francisco posee una venta de verduras, las cuales comercializa a las afueras de su hogar, un lugar de mucho comercio por ser calle principal y por encontrarse cerca de un mercado, razón por la que transitan muchas personas, lo que beneficia en gran manera a Francisco, ya que muchas personas se quedan en la pasada, comprándole a el sus productos. Él realiza muchas ventas por unidad, pero en su mayoría realiza ventas que son por mayor, los cuales sus clientes hacen para surtir otros negocios, por lo que Francisco solicita un préstamo con el deseo de surtir aún más su negocio, comprando por mayor: cebollas, repollos, tomates y papas, las cuales son las verduras que más demanda poseen. Francisco espera vender más y de esta forma poder aportas mucho más a su familia, de manera que puedan contar con mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
Francisco Eddy R. V. is 39 years old. He resides in the departament of San Salvador, where he lives with his two minor daughters and his wife, who is a housewife. Francisco sells vegetables outside his house. There are a lot of businesses there because it is a main street and is close to a market. Because of this, a lot of people go by, which benefits Francisco, since many people stop and buy his products. He sells a lot of product in units, but mostly he sells wholesale and his customers distribute to other businesses. Francisco is asking for a loan to diversify his business even more, buying onions, cabbage, tomatoes and potatoes wholesale. These are the vegetables that have the highest demand. Francisco hopes to sell more and in this way contribute much more to his family so that they can have more financial stability.

Translated from Spanish by Ellen Donohue, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy onions, cabbage, tomatoes and potatoes wholesale.

loans.name: 02.06.10 - Thieu Hoa Group

texts.en: Son N. T. (65) is a 70-year-old female living in the town of Thieu Hoa -Thanh Hoa. Son is the group leader of a three-member group loan offered by Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women, a Kiva partner. While each member of the group receives an individual loan, they all are responsible for paying back the loans of their fellow group members if someone is delinquent or defaults. The official name of this borrowing group is 02.06.10 Thieu Hoa (02.06.10 Thieu Hoa). Son is married and has three adult children. To make a living, Son raises livestock. The main source of income for the business comes from raising cattle for sale. Son has been engaged in this business for more than 30 years and earns approximately 2.000.000 Vietnamese Dong (VND) a month from it. In 2002, Son joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Son has successfully repaid a previous loan of 5.280.000 VND from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. This previous loan was used to purchase baby livestock to raise and sell in the future. She is now requesting a new loan of 6.000.000 VND, which will also be used to purchase baby livestock to raise and sell in the future. It will be the ninth loan Son has taken from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Son plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve and expand her business. About the other borrowers in the group: 1. N. T. Tam (48) is a 34-year-old female who is requesting a 6.000.000 VND loan to support her business of raising livestock. 2. N. T. Hoa (67) is a 40-year-old female who is also requesting a 6.000.000 VND loan to support her business of raising livestock. About Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women The mission of Fund for Thanh Hoa Poor Women (FPW) is to provide sustainable financial services to disadvantaged women in rural areas in the Thanh Hoa province. *Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva. Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, Kiva created this template for our Field Partner to allow them to continue to post loans in Vietnamese while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders. Son N. T. (65) là 70 tuổi nữ. Cô ấy sống ở thành phố Thieu Hoa -Thanh Hoa. Son là trưởng nhóm của nhóm vay gồm có 3 các thành viên. Mặc dù mỗi thành viên trong nhóm nhận được từng khoản vay cá nhân, nhưng tất cả họ đều chịu trách nhiệm hoàn trả lại khoản vay của các thành viên trong nhóm của mình nếu một người nào đó trễ hạn hay không trả được nợ.. Tên chính thức của nhóm vay này là 02.06.10 Thieu Hoa (02.06.10 Thieu Hoa). Trong khi không phải chỉ có các phương thức tạo nên thu nhập, mà nguồn thu nhập chính của công việc kinh doanh chủ yếu từ chăn nuôi gia súc để bán. Son thực hiện công việc kinh doanh này trong hơn 30 năm. Từ các hoạt động này, Son kiếm được khoảng 2.000.000 VND. Vào 2002, Son đã tham gia Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women để có thể tiếp cận với các dịch vụ tài chính giúp cải T.ện sinh hoạt và khả năng tham gia vào các hoạt động kinh doanh của cô ấy/ anh ấy. Son đã hoàn trả hết khoản vay trước đây là 5.280.000 VND từ Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Khoản vay trước đây được sử dụng mua gia súc còn nhỏ để nuôi & bán sau này. Cô ấy hiện đang đề nghị một khoản vay mới là 6.000.000 VND. Khoản vay sẽ là 9th khoản vay của người vay từ Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Về Những Người vay khác trong Nhóm: 1. N. T. Tam (48) là 34 tuổi nữ. Cô ấy đề nghị khoản vay là 6.000.000 VND. Khoản vay này sẽ được sử dụng để hỗ trợ công việc kinh doanh trong lĩnh vực nông nghiệp. Mục đích chính của việc kinh doanh là chăn nuôi gia súc. 2. N. T. Hoa (67) là 40 tuổi nữ. Cô ấy đề nghị khoản vay là 6.000.000 VND. Khoản vay này sẽ được sử dụng để hỗ trợ công việc kinh doanh trong lĩnh vực nông nghiệp. Mục đích chính của việc kinh doanh là chăn nuôi gia súc. Về Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women: Nhiệm vụ của Quỹ Hỗ trợ Phụ Nữ Nghèo Thanh Hóa (FPW) là cung cấp các dịch vụ tài chính bền vững cho những người phụ nữ kém may mắn ở các vùng nông thôn tỉnh Thanh Hóa. *Lưu ý: Để phát huy tối đa hiệu quả & giảm chi phí, khoản vay này đã được thông báo bằng biểu mẫu để có thể được Kiva tự động biên dịch. . Do việc biên dịch thủ công các danh mục rất tốn kém, nên Kiva đã tạo biểu mẫu này cho phần Field Partner (Trường Đối Tác) cho phép họ tiếp tục thông báo các khoản vay bằng Vietnamese trong khi cung cấp thông tin có chất lượng & chính xác cho người cho vay Kiva. ."

loans.use: To purchase baby livestock to raise and sell in the future

loans.name: Nayra Violeta

texts.es: Nayra Violeta F. D. M. D. 34 años D. edad, vive junto a su esposo quien trabaja para una empresa privada, y junto a sus dos hijos menores D. edad, D. los cuales el mayor estudiar y el menor, se encuentra a cargo D. ella todo el tiempo, por lo que la acompaña a su lugar D. trabajo todos los días, ella resiD. junto a su familia en el municipio D. Ilopango en el departamento D. San Salvador. Nayra posee una venta D. productos comestibles como almuerzos, golosinas, bebidas y otros más, negocio el cual esta ubicado en las instalaciones D. La  Fuerza Armada D. El Salvador, lugar en el que trabaja desD. hace 10 años atrás, en donD. poco ha poco ha tratado D. ir surtiendo, D. manera que pueda vender mucho más, a pesar D. que existe gran competencia dentro del mismo lugar, Nayra por ser una mujer muy atenta, aseada y humilD., posee muchos clientes los cuales se encuentran totalmente satisfechos con todas estas cualidades y así mismo por sus precios razonables con los alimentos. Ella solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda comprar toda la materia prima necesaria para elaborar desayunos, y almuerzos, así mismo para surtir su negocio con diferentes tipos D. golosinas y productos bebibles, así D. esta forma Nayra desea salir adelante y contar con todo lo necesario para su negocio y la estabilidad D. este.
texts.en:
Nayra Violeta F. D. M. is 34 years old. She lives with her husband, who works for a private business, and her two minor children. The oldest is in school and the youngest is always under her care. He accompanies her at work every day. She lives with her family in the town of Llopango in the department of San Salvador. Nayra sells food products such as lunch, snacks, drinks and more. Her business is located in the facilities of The Armed Forces of El Salvador. She has worked there for 10 years and she has tried to diversify little by little in order to sell more, despite having a lot of competitionin the same place. Because Nayra is an attentive, clean and humble woman, she has a lot of customers who are totally satisfied with these qualities and her food's reasonable prices. She is asking for a loan with which she can buy all of the raw material she needs to make breakfasts and lunches. She will also diversify her business with different types of snacks and beverage products. In this way, Nayra wants to get ahead and have everything she needs for her business and its stability.

Translated from Spanish by Ellen Donohue, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase different food products.

loans.name: Manuel De Jesús

texts.es: Manuel de Jesús R. G. tiene 43 años de edad, es una persona trabajadora y responsable quien posee su negocio propio gracias al cual pueda llevar el sustento diarios a su hogar y así sostener a su familia. Vive en el municipio de Santa Tecla junto a su esposa quien trabaja en el mercado municipal de ese mismo lugar, y junto a sus dos hijas de 18 y 10 años de edad. Manuel posee un negocio en el cual repara y vende joyas de oro y de plata, así mismo repara relojes y vende repuestos para estos. Su negocio esta ubicado en el centro de Santa Tecla en donde existe un gran número de negocios similares en los cuales se dedican al mismo oficio, por lo que Manuel desea poder brindar el mejor servicio posible para sus clientes de manera que estos sean fieles a él. Es por esto que solicita un préstamo a través del cual cuente con el dinero necesario para comprar mayor cantidad de joyas y repuestos para estas y para relojes, así mismo para comprar diferentes herramientas las cuales son necesarias para realizar las reparaciones de estos productos, y así elaborar un mejor trabajo el cual le lleve menos tiempo y de esta forma mantener a sus clientes contentos y así sostener su negocio lo más estable posible para seguir adelante.
texts.en:
Manuel de Jesús Rodríquez G. is 43 years old. He is a responsible and hard-working person that owns his own business which maintains his household and daily living expenses and supports his family. He lives in the town of Santa Tecla with his wife, who also works in the town market, and their two daughters ages 18 and 10. Manuel repairs and sells gold and silver jewelry for a living. He also repairs watches and sells spare parts for them. His business is located in the center of Santa Tecla where there are many similar businesses that offer the same services. Because of this, Manuel wants to offer his customers the best possible service so that they will remain loyal to him. He is requesting a loan to buy spare parts to repair jewelry and watches and to increase his inventory of jewelry. He also needs to buy different tools which are necessary for the repairs. This way he will be able to produce better work in less time and keep his customers happy while maintaining his business in the most stable way possible in order to move ahead.

Translated from Spanish by Ann Achilli, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To increase his inventory of jewelry and to buy spare parts to repair jewelry and watches

location.town: Santa Tecla, departamento de La Libertad

loans.name: Khisayn

texts.ru: Хайруллоев Хисайн проживает в городе Куляб. Возраст, 45 лет. Женат, имеет 9 детей. Жена, домохозяйка. Сам Хисайн имеет высшее образование, учитель. По специальности работал 8 лет. У него большая семья и деньги, которые он получал в школе, ему не хватило. Сейчас Хисейн занимается торговлей на рынке. Он в основном продает вещи необходимые хозяйству. Этим видом бизнеса занимается более 10 лет. Кредит берет для увеличения ассортимента товара.
texts.en:
Khisayn K., 45, lives in Kulyab. He is married and has 9 children. Khisayn's wife is a homemaker. Mr. K. is a college-educated teacher. He has been teaching for 8 years, but the money he makes at school is not enough to sustain Khisayn's large family. Therefore, Mr. K. earns an extra income by selling household goods at a market. He has been selling for 10 years. Mr. K. will use this loan to increase the assortment of goods sold.

Translated from Russian by Aleksandr Zhuk, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To increase the assortment of goods sold

loans.name: Yaneth Nathaly

texts.es: Yaneth Nathaly P. D. A. D. 25 años D. edad, es una mujer joven pero muy responsable con su hogar y su familia, ella vive junto a su esposo el cual trabaja para una empresa privada, y junto a sus tres hijos D. 5, 4 y 3 años D. edad, D. los cuales los dos mayores van al kinder, Yaneth resiD. junto a su familia en el departamento D. San Salvador. Ella posee una venta D. cosméticos para el cuidado D. la piel, crema para pies, manos y rostro, perfumes, maquillaje, perfumería y otros más, así mismo comercializa ropa para mujeres y niños, ella es una persona muy trabajadora, la cual se encarga D. comercializar su ropa en diferentes departamentos D. El Salvador tales como Cuscatlán, Sonsonate, San Miguel y otros más, ella visita un departamento diferente una vez a la semana y el resto D. días venD. sus productos en colonias, municipios y cantones del departamento D. San Salvador. Su negocio es muy productivos, por lo que desea poder contar con más productos, es por ello que solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda comprar más cosméticos y diferentes estilos D. ropa, D. forma que pueda contar con más clientes quienes le permitan aumentar sus ganancias, D. esta forma ella espera poder invertir en su hogar y así mismo compartir más gastos junto a su esposo para tener una mejor vida para su familia.
texts.en:
Yaneth Nathaly P. D. A. is 25 years old; she is a young woman, but very responsible with her home and family. She lives with her husband who works for a private business, and together they have three children ages 5, 4 and 3. The older two children go to day care. Yaneth lives with her family in an apartment in San Salvador. She owns a cosmetics shop selling skin care products, creams for feet, face and hands, perfumes, make-up and other things. She also sells women's and children's clothing. She is very hardworking, and she's in charge of marketing her clothing to different stores in El Salvador area such as: Cuscatlán, Sonsonate, San Miguel and many others. She visits different stores once a week, and the rest of the days she sells her products in the neighborhoods and business districts in the San Salvador state. Her business is very productive, and for this reason she wants to be able to amass more products. For this reason, she is asking for a loan so that she can buy more cosmetics, and different clothing and styles to appeal to more clients. That will allow her to increase her earnings. She hopes to invest in her home and also share in the household expenses together with her husband to have a better life for her family.

Translated from Spanish by Jo Longnecker, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase cosmetics

loans.name: Delmy Aracely

texts.es: Delmy Aracely C. D. M. D. 34 años D. edad,  resiD. en el municipio D. Soyapango, ubicado en el departamento D. San Salvador, vive con su esposo el cual trabaja en su negocio propio, repartiendo tambos D. gas propano, así mismo vive junto a sus tres hijas D. 10, 8 y 3 años D. edad, D. las cuales la mayor y la menor disfrutan mucho estar en el negocio junto a Delmy. Ella posee una tienda en la que comercializa productos perecederos y D. primera necesidad, la cual esta ubicada en su casa D. habitación, así mismo elabora platillos típicos como: yuca frita, atol D. elote entre otros más, estos los elabora todas las tardes, D. esta misma forma comercializa productos D. belleza como maquillaje, cremas para el cuidado D. la piel y el cabello y otros más, los cuales venD. D. forma ambulante. Ella demuestra ser una mujer muy responsable, la cual realiza diferentes actividades, con el deseo D. obtener mayores ganancias con las cuales le brinD. toda la ayuda necesaria a su esposo con los gastos del hogar. Es por esta razón que ella solicita un préstamo por medio del cual cuente con el dinero necesario para invertir en la tienda comprando mayor cantidad D. productos D. primera necesidad, así mismo comprar materia prima como maíz y elotes para la elaboración D. los platillos típicos y también comprar más cosméticos, esto lo hace con el enorme deseo D. mejorar sus ventas y contar con mayor mercadería que ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Delmy Aracely C. D. M. is 34 years old. She lives in the town of Soyapango, located in the department of San Salvador. She lives with her husband, who has his own business repairing propane tanks, and their three daughters ages 10, 8 and 3, of which the oldest and the youngest love to go to work with Delmy. Delmy owns a store that sells perishable products and basic necessities. It is located in her house. She also makes traditional dishes such as fried yucca, atol D. elote (a drink maD. from corn) and other things. She makes these every afternoon. She also sells beauty products such as make-up, skin and hair care cremes and others that she sells as a street vendor. She is a responsible woman who works various jobs with the desire to earn more in order to help her husband with the household expenses. It is for this reason that she is requesting a loan so that she can buy more basic necessity products for her store, more raw materials like corn and elotes to make traditional dishes and also to buy more cosmetics. She wants to increase her sales and have more merchandise to offer her customers.

Translated from Spanish by Ann Achilli, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy more products for her store, more raw materials to make traditional dishes and cosmetics.

loans.name: Efraín Ernesto

texts.es: Efraín Ernesto D. C. de 45 años de edad, es una persona muy alegre y responsable quien esta muy orgullos de su extensa familia, su esposa quien se dedica a los quehaceres D. hogar, y cuatro hijas de 15, 12, 9 y 8 años de edad, las cuales todas se dedican a estudiar, razón por la que Efraín hace siempre su mayor esfuerzo en su trabajo, ya que el desea que sus hijas tengan un mejor futuro. Efraín reside junto a su familia en el municipio de Ilopango, lugar en el cual esta ubicado su negocio, el cual es una panadería en donde elabora varios tipos de pan dulce y pan Frances, conocido también como pan baguette. A pesar que su negocio solo tiene cinco años de existir, el ha ido abriéndose camino y dándose a conocer de la mejor manera, ya que es muy responsable a la hora de entregar sus pedidos y por elaborar pan a muy buenos precios. Efraín solicita un préstamo a Integral, con el deseo de mejorar su negocio, comprando nuevas herramientas para la elaboración D. pan, así mismo realizar algunas mejoras a la zona asignada para la panadería, mejorando el techo, el piso y las paredes. De esta forma él espera mejorar su rendimiento en el trabajo, ya que podrá sentirse de una forma más cómoda en el lugar que realiza el pan. Efraín es un padre muy responsable quien trabaja muy duro para darle todo lo necesario a su familia, de manera que no les haga falta lo esencial en sus vidas.
texts.en:
Efraín Ernesto D. C., age 45, is a very happy and responsible person who is very proud of his extensive family. His wife devotes herself to the household chores and their four children; ages 15, 12, 9, and 8. The children go to school. This is the reason that Efraín always puts his greatest effort in his work. He wants his daughters to have a better future. Efraín lives with his family in the Ilopango municipality. This is where his business is located. He has a bakery where he makes various types of sweet breads and French breads, also know as baguettes. Even though he has only had his business for five years, he has been finding his way and getting to know the best way. He is very responsible about delivering his orders on time, and he makes bread at very good prices. Efraín is asking Integral for a loan in the hopes of improving his business. He will buy new tools for making bread. He will also make some improvements in the area allocated for the bakery. He will improve the roof, the floor, and the walls. This way he hopes to improve his work performance. He will be able to feel more comfortable in the place where he makes bread. Efraín is a very responsible father who works very hard to give his family the necessities. This way they will not lack the essentials in their lives.

Translated from Spanish by Ginny Kalish, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy tools for making bread

loans.name: Ray

texts.en: Mrs. Ray P. is 32 years old and married. In order to help meet her family's needs, Ray P. sells some grocery items, both retail and wholesale, at the local market. She has five years experience in this sector and earns approximately $4 per day. Her husband assists her in operating the business. They have been married for years and have six young children who attend school. Ray P. hopes to enlarge her business and is applying for a US $600 loan to be used to accumulate a larger number of necessary grocery items to sell. With any remaining cash from the loan, she will repair her old house.

loans.use: to accumulate a larger number of necessary grocery items to sell

loans.name: 07.05.12 - Thieu Hoa Group

texts.en:
Huong N. T. (3) is a 30 year-old femaL. living in the town of Thieu Toan Thieu Hoa.  Huong is the group leader of a 3-member group loan offered by Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. WhiL. each member of the group receives an individual loan, they all are responsibL. for paying back the loans of their fellow group members if someone is delinquent or defaults. The official name of this borrowing group is 12 Thieu Toan Thieu Hoa (07.05.12 Thieu hoa).

Huong is married. To making a living, Huong owns & operates a business venture in the agriculture sector raising livestock. The main source of income for the business comes primarily from raising cattL. for saL.. Huong has been engaged in this business for over 10 years and earns approximately 2.000.000 VND a month from these activities.

In 2002, Huong joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and her ability to engage in business activities. Huong has successfully repaid a previous loan of 6,000,000 VND from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. This previous loan was used to purchase baby livestock to raise & sell in future. She is now requesting a new loan of 5,280,000 VND which will be used to purchase medication for the livestock. This will be the 8th loan taken out by Huong from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Huong plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve and expand her business.

About the Other Borrowers in the Group:

1.  N. T. tinh (4) is a 60 year-old femaL. who is requesting a 6,000,000 VND loan to support her business in the agriculture sector raising livestock.
2.  L. T. lan (11) is a 33 year-old femaL. who is requesting a 6,000,000 VND loan to support her business in the agriculture sector raising livestock.

About Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women:

The mission of Fund for Thanh Hoa Poor Women (FPW) is to provide sustainabL. financial services to disadvantaged women in rural areas in the Thanh Hoa province.


*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva. Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, Kiva created this template for our Field Partner to allow them to continue to post loans in Vietnamese whiL. providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

Huong thực hiện công việc kinh doanh này trong hơn 10 năm.  Từ các hoạt động này, Huong kiếm được khoảng 2.000.000 VND.  Vào 2002, Huong đã tham gia Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women để có thể tiếp cận với các dịch vụ tài chính giúp cải T.ện  sinh hoạt và khả năng tham gia vào các hoạt động kinh doanh của cô ấy/ anh ấy.  Huong đã hoàn trả hết khoản vay trước đây là 6.000.000 VND từ Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.  Khoản vay trước đây được sử dụng mua gia súc còn nhỏ để nuôi & bán sau này. Khoản vay sẽ là 8th khoản vay của người vay từ Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

Nhiệm vụ của Quỹ Hỗ trợ Phụ Nữ Nghèo Thanh Hóa (FPW) là cung cấp các dịch vụ tài chính bền vững cho những người phụ nữ kém may mắn ở các vùng nông thôn tỉnh Thanh Hóa.

loans.name: María De Jesús

texts.es: María D. Jesús M. D. R. D. 45 años D. edad, vive junto a su esposo en casa propia ubicada en ciudad delgado, él posee una sastrería desD. hace muchos años y por su excelente trabajo cuenta con muchos clientes. María trabaja desD. su casa en su negocio propio el cual es una tienda D. productos D. primera necesidad, en la que comercializa sus productos todos los días D. la semana, contando con varios clientes los cuales compran a diario. María desea poder surtir la tienda con productos muy necesarios para el hogar como detergentes líquidos y en polvo, así mismo comprar bolsitas D. shampoo, y productos comestibles como pan, huevos, frijoles y otros más, D. manera D. poder contar con todo lo más esencial para una tienda y que las personas buscan más, ya que D. esta forma ella podrá brindar un mejor servicio el cual le permita contar con más clientes. María es una señora muy visionaria quien desea ver en mejores condiciones su negocio, más surtido, y produciendo mayores ganancias, D. manera que ella pueda poseer una mejor estabilidad económica junto a su esposo.
texts.en:
María D. Jesús M. D. R., age 45, lives with her husband in her own house, which is located in Delgado. He has had a tailor shop for many years. He has a lot of customers because of his excellent work. María works from her house in her own business, which is a store selling basic needs products. She sells her products everyday of the week. She has lots of customers who shop daily. María wishes to stock her store with much needed products for the home like liquid and powdered detergents. She will also buy small containers of shampoo and food products like eggs, beans, and other things. She will do this to be able to have all of the most essential and requested things in her store. This way she will be able to offer better service, which will allow her to have more customers. María is a very visionary woman who wishes to see her store in better condition, better stocked, and producing greater earnings. That way she will have better economic stability together with her husband.

Translated from Spanish by Ginny Kalish, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy basic needs products

location.town: Ciudad Delgado en el departamento de San  Salvador

loans.name: Abdullokhon

texts.ru: Бурхонов Абдуллохон проживает в городе Куляб. Возраст, 36 лет. Женат, имеет 3 детей. Образование среднее. Более 7 лет занимается животноводством. Имеет небольшой коровник, где разводит скот для перепродажи их на рынке. В этом ему помогает его семья. Кредит берет для закупа крупно - рогатого скота.
texts.en:
Abdullokhon B. lives in Kulyab. He is 36, married, and has 3 children. For more than 7 years, Mr. B. has been raising cattle. Mr. B. has a small cattle farm where he raises cattle for sale at the market. Mr. B.'s family helps him to run the farm. This loan Mr. B. will use to purchase cattle.

Translated from Russian by Aleksandr Zhuk, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase cattle

loans.name: Juana Antonia

texts.es: Juana Antonia M. D. B. D. 45 años D. edad, resiD. en Ciudad Delgado, ubicado en el departamento D. San Salvador. Ella es una madre D. familia muy responsable y dedicada a su familia, la cual posee dos negocios propios, entre los cuales reparte su tiempo para dedicarse a ambos. Juana vive junto a su esposo el cual es empleado, y junto a dos hijos. Ella posee una carpintería, la cual esta ubicada en su casa D. habitación y en donD. trabaja elaborando todo tipo D. artículos hechos D. madera los cuales son hechos por pedidos previos, así mismo Juana se dedica a la venta D. ropa para niños y mujeres, la cual comercializa D. forma ambulante en diferentes municipios D. San Salvador, tales como Soyapango e Ilopango. Ella trabaja muy duro ya que es una persona la cual desea mucho ver a su familia D. una forma estable, la cual cuente con todo lo necesario. Juana solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda comprar madera por mayor, así mismo herramientas para la elaboración D. pedidos hechos por sus clientes, tales como serruchos, pegamento, clavos y otros más, D. esta misma forma ella desea poder comprar mayor cantidad D. ropa, en diferentes tallas y colores, D. manera que sus ventas se puedan incrementar.
texts.en:
Juana Antonia M. D. B., age 45, lives in the city of Delgado, which is located in the San Salvador department. She is a very responsible mother who is dedicated to her family. She has two of her own businesses. She divides her time between both activities. She has a carpentry shop, which is located in her house. She works making all types of things from wood. They are maD. by prior order. Juana also sells clothing for children and women. She sells by traveling to different municipalities in San Salvador like Soyapango and Ilopango. She works very hard because she is a person who really wants to see her family in stable condition and having everything they need. Juana is requesting a loan to be able to buy wood wholesale. She will also buy tools to make the orders received from her customers. She will buy things like saws, glue, nails, and other things. This way she hopes to be able to buy a larger quantity of clothes in different sizes and colors. This way she will be able to increase her sales.

Translated from Spanish by Ginny Kalish, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy wood and carpentry tools and clothes to sell

location.town: Ciudad Delgado en el departamento de San  Salvador

loans.name: Rosa Efigenia

texts.es: Rosa Efigenia H. M. D. V. D. 59 años D. edad, resiD. en el departamento D. Ahuachapán, lugar en el cual vive junto a su esposo D. 65 años D. edad, quien le ayuda en el negocio a la señora Rosa. Ella se dedica a la elaboración D. trapeadores, los cuales elabora en su casa, y que posteriormente venD. D. forma ambulante junto a su esposo, Rosa venD. su productos en diferentes colonias, cantones y pueblos del departamento D. Ahuachapán, así mismo los fines D. semana se coloca cerca D. diferentes mercados, con la esperanza D. poder aumentar sus ventas. Ella es una persona muy humilD. y trabajadora, la cual desea salir adelante y D. esta forma contar con el dinero necesario para poseer una vida estable junto a su esposo. Rosa solicita un préstamo por medio del cual le sea posible comprar mayor cantidad D. tela, para la elaboración D. los trapeadores, así mismo comprar agujas para la maquina D. cocer y diferentes colores D. hilo, todo lo que le permita poder ofrecer mayor cantidad D. trapeadores y así aumentar sus ventas. Tanto Rosa como su esposo son personas que se esfuerzan a diario, dando el mayor esfuerzo que les sea posible para mantener su negocio a flote.
texts.en:
Rosa Efigenia H. M. D. V., age 59, lives in the Ahuachapán department. She lives with her 65 year old husband, and he helps Rosa in the business. She makes mops in her house, and she later sells them as a traveling salesperson with her husband. Rosa sells her products in different villages, cantons, and towns in the Ahuachapán. Also, on the weekends she sets up near different markets in the hopes that she will be able to increase her sales. She is a very humble and hard-working person. She wants to get ahead and have the money that is needed to have a stable life with her husband. Rosa is requesting a loan so that she can buy a greater quantity of fabric to make the mops. She will also buy needles for her sewing machine and different colors of thread. She will buy everything that will allow her to sell a greater quantity of mops and increase her sales. Rosa and her husband are people who put forth daily effort. They put forth the greatest effort possible to keep their business afloat.

Translated from Spanish by Ginny Kalish, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy fabric, thread, and needles to make mops to sell
